entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have managed to survive this far but you have yet to complete your primary and secondary missions.
entries.journal_entry_description: Descend into the research facility to carry out your mission.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You know the location in the facility. All you have to do now is get there alive.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Seach cryogenic storage units in the cryogenics laboratory.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Search the office of Doctor Griffax Jin to see if you can find anything.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: [Klex Fulgor] Uh, sorry I've been so rude, I just didn't think you would make it this far. To access that terminal you'll need higher access, one of the lab's scientists should have a key you can use.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: A science access key must be around here somewhere. Maybe there is one on an undead scientist. Find a scientist and take his key.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: [Klex Fulgor] You've gone about as far as I can help you. Hopefully that key will give you the information you need to continue.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Use the Science Console to see if there is any record of a unmutated sample.
